title: Music - Background - Night Vol1
description: Discover the night in your games with 20 Night tracks. Bring the essence of nightlife with these immersive soundtracks!
longDescription:
🌙 Night Music Pack for Games 🌙


Youtube Demo: here


Immerse your games in the mysterious vibe of the night with the Night Music Pack. This pack features 20 tracks that capture the essence of nightlife, perfect for urban-themed games or moonlit adventures.


Each track is meticulously produced to reflect the tranquility and vibrancy of dusk, creating a soundtrack that enhances every game moment.


The tracks are ideal for exploration games, engaging narratives, and any genre that benefits from an immersive nocturnal mood. Easy to integrate and fully compatible with Unreal Engine.


With this pack, your games will gain a new dimension of depth and emotion. Let our Night Music Pack transform your players' nighttime experience!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Channel: 2 channels
  • Additional: Stereo
  • Encoding: PCM

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 40:46

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://captainthatch.forgedream.com

Important/Additional Notes:
